thread.title: UBS Poaches Merrill Broker Managing $425 Million – Street Moves
thread.title_full: UBS Poaches Merrill Broker Managing $425 Million – Street Moves - WSJ

author: Michael Wursthorn
title: UBS Poaches Merrill Broker Managing $425 Million – Street Moves
text:
A Merrill Lynch adviser to ultrawealthy clients has decamped for rival UBS Group AG’s U.S. wealth-management arm.
Adviser Mark Wilkins joined UBS on Thursday and will work out of its St. Louis branch, a UBS spokesman said. Mr. Wilkins was a 21-year veteran of Merrill and had amassed $425 million in client assets while there. He generated $3.6 million in annual fees and commissions, the spokesman added.
Mr. Wilkins, a U.S. Army... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
